about_the_game:
Welcome to the true world of strategy! This game is a unique project designed specifically for players seeking an exciting pastime and a test of leadership and strategic skills.

Here, you can control the movement of troops on the battlefield and send them to capture mines with just a click. This is the only online flash strategy game where you have full control over each fighter and squad. Manage your squads, find the enemy's weak points, create complex tactical maneuvers on the battlefield, and enjoy thrilling battles.

Are you ready to face the challenge of real tactical battles?
Each battle is a true test of your skills and tactical abilities.

Play for free and join thousands of strategists who have already appreciated the unique gameplay, found an exciting pastime, and made true friends.

Earn rewards by completing challenging raids and improving your skills. Play with your friends, share secrets and experiences, and win joint battles in clan wars.

When certain resources are scarce, you can increase your own supplies and trade resources with other players. This is not the final version of the game. The game is constantly being developed and improved.

Develop your economy, trade technologies, choose development paths, and create an invincible army.
You will have an in-depth exploration of new features and game secrets.

Embark on an exciting adventure, showcase your individuality and creativity, pass the tests, and become a true hero of this fascinating world.

Here, you can control the movement of troops on the battlefield and send them to capture mines with just a click. Are you ready to face the challenge of real tactical battles?

Play for free and join thousands of strategists who have already appreciated the unique gameplay, found an exciting pastime, and made true friends.

Earn rewards by completing challenging raids and improving your skills. Play with your friends, share secrets and experiences, and win joint battles in clan wars.

name: War and Peace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP или новее
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo или мощнее
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Разрешение монитора 768 строк и выше
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP или новее
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo или мощнее
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Разрешение монитора 768 строк и выше
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to the true world of strategy! This game is a unique project created specifically for players seeking an exciting pastime and a test of leadership and strategic skills.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Japanese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Korean, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
